name: HUMBUG (itch)
description:
Dr. Gub was experimenting with controlling bugs with his mind to help him transfer to a body with less errors. Things quickly got out of heads and his consciousness changed places with one of the research specimen's.

The doctor needs to first destroy all the parts stuck to different bugs that misdirect the transfer beam. His only chance for this is to crash the parts by putting them under the vacuum cleaner of his former robochair. After the parts are destroyed his goal becomes to manipulate the bug into picking him up to finally get back into his body.

In the meantime the bug - being finally free - is trying to help all his relatives escaping the lab by putting them into the fume hood. However, if all the parts  are destroyed, the bug has to be careful about what it picks.

Controls

Human (body) aim and turn with mouse, go forward with rigth click, pick up bugs by holding the left button.

Bug (body) turn and move with arrows/WASD.
